Sentencas: Advanced characterization methods have been used to analyze the thermo-mechanical behaviour of solid oxide fuel cells in a model stack.
Titulo: Advanced measurement techniques to characterize thermo-mechanical aspects of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The primarily experimental work included contacting studies, sealing of a model stack, thermal and re-oxidation cycling.
Titulo: Advanced measurement techniques to characterize thermo-mechanical aspects of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Also an attempt was made to correlate cell fracture in the stack with pore sizes determined from computer tomography.
Titulo: Advanced measurement techniques to characterize thermo-mechanical aspects of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The contacting studies were carried out using pressure sensitive foils.
Titulo: Advanced measurement techniques to characterize thermo-mechanical aspects of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The load to achieve full contact on anode and cathode side of the cell was assessed and applied in the subsequent model stack test.
Titulo: Advanced measurement techniques to characterize thermo-mechanical aspects of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The stack experiment permitted a detailed analysis of stack compaction during sealing.
Titulo: Advanced measurement techniques to characterize thermo-mechanical aspects of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: During steady state operation thermal and re-oxidation cycling the changes in open cell voltage and acoustic emissions were monitored.
Titulo: Advanced measurement techniques to characterize thermo-mechanical aspects of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Significant softening of the sealant material was observed at low temperatures.
Titulo: Advanced measurement techniques to characterize thermo-mechanical aspects of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Heating in the thermal cycling loop of the stack appeared to be less critical than the cooling.
Titulo: Advanced measurement techniques to characterize thermo-mechanical aspects of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Re-oxidation cycling led to significant damage if a critical re-oxidation time was exceeded.
Titulo: Advanced measurement techniques to characterize thermo-mechanical aspects of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Microstructural studies permitted further insight into the re-oxidation mechanism.
Titulo: Advanced measurement techniques to characterize thermo-mechanical aspects of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Finally, the maximum defect size in the cell was determined by computer tomography.
Titulo: Advanced measurement techniques to characterize thermo-mechanical aspects of solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: A limit of maximum anode stress was estimated and the result correlated this with the failure strength observed during the model stack testing.
Titulo: Advanced measurement techniques to characterize thermo-mechanical aspects of solid oxide fuel cells
